enabled.description:
enabled
Turn replacing on and off
   
Boolean

    
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)

mode.description:
mode
Object picking modes
   
TreeModes
Sapling override object picking options
    
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)
Must be a valid TreeModes (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)

oneOf.description: Check biome, then region, then dimension, pick the first one that has options
Check biome, regions, and dimensions, and pick any option from the total list
